course_description: This travel seminar seeks to explore questions of religious and ecclesial identity formation in contemporary Cuba. We will study how Cubans today live their faith in a multi-religious, decolonial world, which includes atheists, Catholics, Protestants, Pentecostals, and followers of traditional African religions.
